Class TextAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.TextAnalyzer

  • public class TextAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object

    TextAnalyzer

    Has one method that takes a string and returns a linkHashMap of word occurrence.

    Note: The TextAnalyzer class contains the following methods: public static LinkedHashMap String, Long htmlStringToFreqMap(String str)

    Since:
    2020-11-15
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mike Hodges

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> htmlStringToFreqMap(java.lang.String str)
